For contemporary monarchies, see List of current monarchies.
Main article: List of monarchies
It has been suggested that this article be merged with List of monarchies. (Discuss) Proposed since November 2017.
This article does not cite any sources. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. (August 2010) (Learn how and when to remove this template message)

Note: entries in bold refer to groups of kingdoms.

  • 2 Antiquity

Ancient Near East[edit]

It has been suggested that this article be merged with List of Bronze Age States and List of Iron Age States. (Discuss) Proposed since November 2017.

  • Kingdom of Kish (c. 2900 BC – 2296 BC)

  • Minoan (c. 2700 BC – c. 1600 BC)
  • Kingdom of Uruk (c. 2600 BC – 2048 BC)
